fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Command: Create a 1 HP, 2 Hand Size, 1 Channel Soldier. It draws 2 cards a phase. It will not show up on the playerlist, but you may play cards as if it were a player. [1 use, Unique] 
- Arms: Change a card in your hand into a non-special attacking card of your choice. Gains a use every 3 players you outlive. [2 uses, 1 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
